about_the_game:
An apocalyptic wave shooter set in a prison. Choose your inmate, power up your weapon and charachter, let the bodies hit the floor!

You are sleeping in your dilapidated cell, when you hear a lot of commotion. An inmate you had bonded with in the past comes running, soaked in blood, and hands you a gun and all the gear that was confiscated when you got arrestred. Seconds later, a horde of inhuman beings dismember and eat them in front of your eyes. It's Go Time.

Chosse between differently skilled inmates, each with their own backstory. Kill hordes of zombies while you listen to an inspired Industrial Metal soundrack.

Jared: A former soldier who used excessive force in order to stop a robbery at a local gas station.

Luna: A beautiful transgender woman who was forced to use deadly self-defense in order to save herself from a vicious attack.

Takashi: A Japanese Yakuza member who killed 9 rival gang memebers who attacked him in a public restroom.

Imani: A gorgeous apothecary from the deep south, she was incarcerated after one of her potions was used to poison multiple people.

Lucia: The wife of a former Italian Mafia boss who was found guilty of poisoning the suspects for the execution of his husband.

content_descriptors.notes: Zombies try to eat you and explode when you kill them ;)

name: IncarceRebel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Quad core @ 2.40 ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
